description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 2023-07-24 at 12:00 EDT. Work under this Standing Offer covers the supply of all labour, material, tools, equipment, travel, and expertise required to provide minor repairs and maintenance in general trades as specified in the Basis of Payment for the following DND (Department of National Defence) work sites: .1Vimy Ridge Armoury – 337 Stubb Ross Rd, Lethbridge .2Patterson Armoury - 120 Cuyler Road, Medicine Hat .3Kipp Range – 10 km NW of Lethbridge on Hwy 509. Services are to be provided on an ‘as requested’ basis. It is anticipated that one (1) firm will be issued the standing offer. The standing offer will be issued for a period of three (3) years with two(2) additional 1-year option years. Additionally, it is anticipated that minor repairs and maintenance in general trades will be required on an ‘as requested’ basis for DND work sites located in the province of Alberta.
duration_in_months: The standing offer will be issued for a period of three (3) years with two(2) additional 1-year option years.
tags: Public Works and Government Services Canada
minor repairs and maintenance in general trades
full_summary:
**Tender Title**
W689C-220015, General Trades Services
**Reference Number**
WS4071762417-Doc4071789574
**Status**
Cancelled

**Background and Requirements**

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a contractor to provide general trades services, including labour, material, tools, equipment, travel, and expertise, for the maintenance and repair of three DND work sites in Alberta. The services will be provided on an "as requested" basis. The contractor will be required to supply all necessary resources to perform minor repairs and maintenance at the following locations:

* Vimy Ridge Armoury: 337 Stubb Ross Rd, Lethbridge
* Patterson Armoury: 120 Cuyler Road, Medicine Hat
* Kipp Range: 10 km NW of Lethbridge on Hwy 509

**Tender Information**

* Solicitation Number: WS4071762417
* Publication Date: 2023-07-07
* Closing Date: 2023-07-24T12:00:00 (EDT)
* Estimated Contract Duration: 3 years, with 2 additional 1-year option years

**Key Requirements**

* The contractor must be able to provide services on an "as requested" basis
* The contractor must supply all necessary resources to perform minor repairs and maintenance
* The contractor must have expertise in general trades services

**Trade Agreements**

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Regions of Opportunity**

* Alberta

**Contact Information**

* Contracting Authority: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contracting Officer: Lee, Victoria (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [victoria.lee@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:victoria.lee@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: Not available
* Fax: Not available

**Notice URL**
http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16808931?extsite=MTY4MDg5MzFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

The information is still accurate and includes all the key details, but it is presented in a more organized and easy-to-read manner.
